Synopsis: Creates a new system message for a chat request.
Description: The New-ChatRequestSystemMessage function creates a new system message for a chat request. It takes the user request as input and returns a hashtable containing the role and content of the system message.
Outputs:
System.Collections.Hashtable
A hashtable containing the role and content of the system message.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$userRequest = "Please wait while we connect you to an agent."
New-ChatRequestSystemMessage -userRequest $userRequest
This example creates a new system message with the specified user request.
